pixi.spine.SpineTextureLoader

type
class
metadata
:native
"PIXI.SpineTextureLoader"

Constructor

new(basePath : String, ?crossorigin : Bool)
parameters
basePath {String} Tha base path where to look for the images to be loaded
crossorigin {Bool} Whether requests should be treated as crossorigin
Supporting class to load images from spine atlases as per spine spec.

Instance Methods

load(page : Dynamic, file : String) : Void

parameters
page {spine.AtlasPage} Atlas page to which texture belongs
file {String} The file to load, this is just the file path relative to the base path configured in the constructor
Starts loading a base texture as per spine specification

unload(texture : pixi.textures.BaseTexture) : Void

parameters
texture {BaseTexture} Texture object to destroy
Unloads a previously loaded texture as per spine specification
